item.title: Music
item.dc:creator: @Hypocrite Hypocrite
item.description:
@Hypocrite wrote:

All kinds of Rock.

Classic, Heavy Metal, headbanger, whatever. Rock is way better than rap.

There are always the few that break the rules, I like the Beastie Boys and a few rap songs.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

I like rock/some metal/Punk mostly punk but seriously guys not to burst your bubble on the rap music this its just like the ramones. In the end its all repetative and boring just about all the songs from the ramones are the same thing like most rappers…Now Im not trying to flame or anything Im just stating a fact well more of an observation.

item.title: Music
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“White Castle, post:16, topic:65952”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=95989.msg1001740#msg1001740 date=1173664711]
I like UK rap and alot of Uk rappers are white. Its more mixed than the american hip hop/rap scene.
[/quote]

Totally untrue! Sure, maybe alot of the mainstream gangstarappas (50 Cent, Pimpschizzlemy12inchpenis etc.) are black, but that doesn’t mean that the overall American rap genre is unmixed. You should check out some underground labels.[/quote]

I didn’t say it was unmixed. I just said that compared to the american rap scene it is more mixed. Not many white rappers have made it big in the USA. That being said the Uk rap scene isn’t very big at all.

Read full topic

I like UK rap and alot of Uk rappers are white. Its more mixed than the american hip hop/rap scene.

item.title: Music
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:12, topic:65952”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=95989.msg1000395#msg1000395 date=1173650478]

Death/Doom/Black/Folk Metal all the way. But sometimes powermetal aswell. Rap just sucks.

You just suck. That goes for Death/Doom/Black/Folk Metal/Powermetal and any other of your favourite music.
[/quote]

Thanks. Your one of those rap loving guys right? If your black, I respect you. If your white, your just a guy that thinks hes black (that is if you are like those rap loving people in our country) I hate those kind of people.[/quote]

It shouldn’t matter what colour I am. We can all like whatever music we want to.

Anyway “Rap loving people” in our country? What’s that? Which country?

Read full topic
